trans-unit.source: Represents the set of arguments, child activities, variables, and delegates that a configured <xref href="System.Activities.Activity"></xref> introduces to the execution environment.
trans-unit.target: 代表组的自变量、 子活动、 变量和委托，一个已配置<xref href="System.Activities.Activity"></xref>引入执行环境。

trans-unit.source: Adds an argument to the collection of arguments of an activity.
trans-unit.target: 将一个参数添加到活动的自变量的集合。

trans-unit.source: The argument to add to the collection.
trans-unit.target: 要添加到集合的参数。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Adds the specified activity to the metadata’s list of imported child activities.
trans-unit.target: 将指定的活动添加到导入的子活动的元数据列表。

trans-unit.source: An imported child activity is a child activity that the parent activity does not schedule directly.
trans-unit.target: 导入的子活动是父活动不直接安排的子活动。

trans-unit.source: Rather, then parent uses this activity to configure some other child activity.
trans-unit.target: 相反，之后父使用此活动配置一些其他子活动。

trans-unit.source: The activity to add.
trans-unit.target: 要添加的活动。

trans-unit.source: Adds the specified activity to the metadata’s list of imported child activities.
trans-unit.target: 将指定的活动添加到导入的子活动的元数据列表。

trans-unit.source: The activity to add.
trans-unit.target: 要添加的活动。

trans-unit.source: The origin.
trans-unit.target: 原点。

trans-unit.source: Adds the specified delegate to the metadata’s list of imported delegates.
trans-unit.target: 将指定的委托添加到导入的委托的元数据的列表。

trans-unit.source: An imported <xref:System.Activities.ActivityDelegate> is an <xref:System.Activities.ActivityDelegate> that the parent activity does not invoke directly.
trans-unit.target: 导入<xref:System.Activities.ActivityDelegate>是<xref:System.Activities.ActivityDelegate>，父活动不会直接调用。</xref:System.Activities.ActivityDelegate> </xref:System.Activities.ActivityDelegate>

trans-unit.source: Rather, the parent uses this <xref:System.Activities.ActivityDelegate> to configure some other child activity.
trans-unit.target: 相反，父使用这<xref:System.Activities.ActivityDelegate>配置一些其他子活动。</xref:System.Activities.ActivityDelegate>

trans-unit.source: The delegate to add.
trans-unit.target: 要添加的委托。

trans-unit.source: Adds the specified delegate to the metadata’s list of imported delegates.
trans-unit.target: 将指定的委托添加到导入的委托的元数据的列表。

trans-unit.source: The delegate to add.
trans-unit.target: 要添加的委托。

trans-unit.source: The origin.
trans-unit.target: 原点。

trans-unit.source: Adds the specified validation error to the metadata’s collection of validation errors.
trans-unit.target: 将指定的验证错误添加到验证错误的元数据集合。

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[crdefault](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] [Imperative Code-Based Validation](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[crdefault](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)][命令性代码基于验证](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: The validation error to add.
trans-unit.target: 要添加的验证错误。

trans-unit.source: Adds a validation error to the metadata’s collection of validation errors using the specified description.
trans-unit.target: 将一个验证错误添加到使用指定的说明的验证错误的元数据集合。

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[crdefault](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] [Imperative Code-Based Validation](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[crdefault](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)][命令性代码基于验证](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: A message that describes the validation error.
trans-unit.target: 描述验证错误的消息。

trans-unit.source: Adds the specified variable to the metadata’s collection of variables.
trans-unit.target: 将指定的变量添加到变量的元数据集合。

trans-unit.source: Variables added using this method are considered part of the activity’s publicly configurable surface, that is, they are to be provided by the consumer of the activity.
trans-unit.target: 使用此方法添加的变量被视为活动的公开配置图面的一部分，也就是说，它们将由活动的使用者提供。

trans-unit.source: For example, <xref:System.Activities.Statements.Sequence> adds the variables in its <xref:System.Activities.Statements.Sequence.Variables%2A> collection using this method.
trans-unit.target: 例如，<xref:System.Activities.Statements.Sequence>添加中的变量其<xref:System.Activities.Statements.Sequence.Variables%2A>使用此方法的集合。</xref:System.Activities.Statements.Sequence.Variables%2A> </xref:System.Activities.Statements.Sequence>

trans-unit.source: An activity’s implementation cannot access variables added using this method.
trans-unit.target: 活动的实现无法访问使用此方法添加的变量。

trans-unit.source: Activities added through <xref:System.Activities.ActivityMetadata.AddImportedChild%2A> (and any of their non-implementation child activities) can access variables added using this method.
trans-unit.target: 通过添加的活动<xref:System.Activities.ActivityMetadata.AddImportedChild%2A>（和它们的任何未实现子活动） 可以访问使用此方法添加的变量。</xref:System.Activities.ActivityMetadata.AddImportedChild%2A>

trans-unit.source: For example, <xref:System.Activities.Statements.Sequence> adds its <xref:System.Activities.Statements.Sequence.Activities%2A> collection in this manner.
trans-unit.target: 例如，<xref:System.Activities.Statements.Sequence>将添加其<xref:System.Activities.Statements.Sequence.Activities%2A>以这种方式的集合。</xref:System.Activities.Statements.Sequence.Activities%2A> </xref:System.Activities.Statements.Sequence>

trans-unit.source: The variable to add.
trans-unit.target: 要添加的变量。

trans-unit.source: Adds the specified variable to the metadata’s collection of variables.
trans-unit.target: 将指定的变量添加到变量的元数据集合。

trans-unit.source: The variable to add.
trans-unit.target: 要添加的变量。

trans-unit.source: The origin.
trans-unit.target: 原点。

trans-unit.source: Binds the specified <xref href="System.Activities.Argument"></xref> to the specified <xref href="System.Activities.RuntimeArgument"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 将指定绑定<xref href="System.Activities.Argument"></xref>到指定<xref href="System.Activities.RuntimeArgument"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Activities.Argument"></xref> to bind.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Activities.Argument"> </xref>绑定。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Activities.RuntimeArgument"></xref> to bind.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Activities.RuntimeArgument"> </xref>绑定。

trans-unit.source: Gets the activity’s <xref href="System.Activities.LocationReferenceEnvironment"></xref> of arguments, variables, delegate arguments, or symbols introduced by a <xref href="System.Activities.Hosting.SymbolResolver"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 获取活动的<xref href="System.Activities.LocationReferenceEnvironment"></xref>的自变量、 变量、 委托自变量或符号引起<xref href="System.Activities.Hosting.SymbolResolver"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The activity’s location reference environment of arguments, variables, delegate arguments, or symbols introduced by a <xref href="System.Activities.Hosting.SymbolResolver"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 活动的位置引用环境的自变量、 变量、 委托自变量或符号引起<xref href="System.Activities.Hosting.SymbolResolver"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the specified object is equal to this metadata instance.
trans-unit.target: 确定指定的对象是否等于此元数据实例。

trans-unit.source: The object to compare.
trans-unit.target: 要比较的对象。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the specified object is equal to this metadata instance; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果指定的对象是否等于此元数据实例;否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Returns a collection of arguments obtained by using reflection.
trans-unit.target: 返回通过使用反射获取的自变量的集合。

trans-unit.source: This method uses an activity’s <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor> to examine all public properties of type <xref:System.Activities.Argument> and returns them in a collection.
trans-unit.target: 此方法使用某个活动的<xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor>检查类型的所有公共属性<xref:System.Activities.Argument>并将它们返回集合中。</xref:System.Activities.Argument> </xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor>

trans-unit.source: A collection of arguments.
trans-unit.target: 自变量的集合。

trans-unit.source: Returns a unique identifier for this metadata instance.
trans-unit.target: 返回此元数据实例的唯一标识符。

trans-unit.source: An integer that uniquely identifies this metadata instance.
trans-unit.target: 一个整数，唯一标识此元数据实例。

trans-unit.source: Returns a collection of imported child activities using reflection.
trans-unit.target: 活动使用反射返回导入的子集合。

trans-unit.source: This method uses an activity’s <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor> to examine all public properties of type <xref:System.Activities.Activity>, or `IList<T>` or `ICollection<T>` where `T` derives from <xref:System.Activities.Activity>, and returns them in a collection.
trans-unit.target: 此方法使用某个活动的<xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor>检查类型的所有公共属性<xref:System.Activities.Activity>，或`IList<T>`或`ICollection<T>`其中`T`派生自<xref:System.Activities.Activity>，并将它们返回集合中。</xref:System.Activities.Activity> </xref:System.Activities.Activity> </xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor>

trans-unit.source: A collection of imported child activities.
trans-unit.target: 导入的子活动的集合。

trans-unit.source: Returns a collection of delegates using reflection.
trans-unit.target: 返回使用反射的委托的集合。

trans-unit.source: This method uses an activity’s <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor> to examine all public properties of type <xref:System.Activities.ActivityDelegate>, or `IList<T>` or `ICollection<T>` where `T` derives from <xref:System.Activities.ActivityDelegate>, and returns them in a collection.
trans-unit.target: 此方法使用某个活动的<xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor>检查类型的所有公共属性<xref:System.Activities.ActivityDelegate>，或`IList<T>`或`ICollection<T>`其中`T`派生自<xref:System.Activities.ActivityDelegate>，并将它们返回集合中。</xref:System.Activities.ActivityDelegate> </xref:System.Activities.ActivityDelegate> </xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor>

trans-unit.source: A collection of delegates.
trans-unit.target: 委托的集合。

trans-unit.source: Returns a collection of variables using reflection.
trans-unit.target: 返回使用反射的变量的集合。

trans-unit.source: This method uses an activity’s <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor> to examine all public properties of type <xref:System.Activities.Variable>, or `IList<T>` or `ICollection<T>` where `T` derives from <xref:System.Activities.Variable>, and returns them in a collection.
trans-unit.target: 此方法使用某个活动的<xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor>检查类型的所有公共属性<xref:System.Activities.Variable>，或`IList<T>`或`ICollection<T>`其中`T`派生自<xref:System.Activities.Variable>，并将它们返回集合中。</xref:System.Activities.Variable> </xref:System.Activities.Variable> </xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor>

trans-unit.source: A collection of variables.
trans-unit.target: 变量的集合。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether there are any validation errors in the metadata.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示元数据中是否存在任何验证错误。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if validation errors are present; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>验证错误是否存在;否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Returns a value that indicates whether the two specified metadata instances are equal.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个值，该值指示两个指定的元数据实例是否相等。

trans-unit.source: The first item to compare.
trans-unit.target: 要比较的第一个项。

trans-unit.source: The second item to compare.
trans-unit.target: 要比较的第二个项。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the two items are equal; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果两个项相等，则否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Returns a value that indicates whether the two specified metadata instances are not equal.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个值，该值指示两个指定的元数据实例是否不相等。

trans-unit.source: The first item to compare.
trans-unit.target: 要比较的第一个项。

trans-unit.source: The second item to compare.
trans-unit.target: 要比较的第二个项。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the two items are not equal; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果两项是否不相等;否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Specifies that the activity requires an extension of the specified type at runtime.
trans-unit.target: 指定活动需要在运行时指定的类型的扩展。

trans-unit.source: If the host fails to provide an extension of the specified type, validation fails.
trans-unit.target: 如果主机无法提供指定类型的扩展，验证将失败。

trans-unit.source: The type of the extension.
trans-unit.target: 扩展的类型。

trans-unit.source: Adds the specified collection of arguments to the activity’s arguments.
trans-unit.target: 将指定的参数集合添加到活动的自变量。

trans-unit.source: The arguments to add.
trans-unit.target: 要添加的参数。

trans-unit.source: Adds the specified collection as imported child activities of the activity.
trans-unit.target: 将指定的集合添加为活动的活动的导入的子活动。

trans-unit.source: This is the equivalent of calling <xref:System.Activities.ActivityMetadata.AddImportedChild%2A> for each item in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 这是调用的等效<xref:System.Activities.ActivityMetadata.AddImportedChild%2A>集合中每个项。</xref:System.Activities.ActivityMetadata.AddImportedChild%2A>

trans-unit.source: The activities to add.
trans-unit.target: 要添加的活动。

trans-unit.source: Adds the specified collection as imported delegates of the activity.
trans-unit.target: 将指定的集合添加为活动的导入委托。

trans-unit.source: This is the equivalent of calling <xref:System.Activities.ActivityMetadata.AddImportedDelegate%2A> for each item in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 这是调用的等效<xref:System.Activities.ActivityMetadata.AddImportedDelegate%2A>集合中每个项。</xref:System.Activities.ActivityMetadata.AddImportedDelegate%2A>

trans-unit.source: The delegates to add.
trans-unit.target: 要添加的委托。

trans-unit.source: Adds the specified collection of validation errors to the metadata’s collection of validation errors.
trans-unit.target: 将指定的验证错误集合添加到验证错误的元数据集合。

trans-unit.source: The validation errors to add.
trans-unit.target: 要添加的验证错误。

trans-unit.source: Adds the specified collection of variables to the activity’s variables.
trans-unit.target: 将指定的变量集合添加到活动的变量。

trans-unit.source: The variables to add.
trans-unit.target: 要添加的变量。
